name: Resume
body:
![](http://juliengdt.github.io/content/images/2015/05/DM4C7350.jpg) # Julien Goudet ## 2 years iOS Developer - Digital Bank > Offline Resume: [Download PDF (Soon)]() > Mail: [juliengdt@icloud.com](mailto:juliengdt@icloud.com?subject=Hello, i just saw your Ghost Blog !) > Phone: [+33646099017](tel:+33646099017) [![Twitter](http://juliengdt.github.io/content/images/static/twitter_icon.png)](https://twitter.com/jlngdt) [![GitHub](http://juliengdt.github.io/content/images/static/github_icon.png)](https://github.com/juliengdt) ------ ### Profile {#profile} Born with a Sega MegaDrive and the first mobile phones, my main aim in my pro life is to build something unique, something I want to be proud of, something respectable. I love my job, coding bunches of lines, ViewControllers and great iPhone apps. With 2 years of experience in iOS Objective-C (and Swift now), I'm always looking for great mobile projects to participate in. And this is me: ![Headshot](http://juliengdt.github.io/content/images/static/jlngdt_rounded.png) ------ ### Skills {#skills} * iOS Development * Objective-C & Swift (1.2) * AFNetworking + JSONModel = <3 * Framework usage * Framework management like Cocoapods (Obj-C) and Carthage (Swift) * Framework Packaging (with or without UI inside) * iOS Mobile Security Coding (Trusted certificates, OWASP compliance, SSL, local handshake, local keychains ... etc) * Mobile Development * Android (enough understood to troll my Android binom) * Git or Mercurial usage (git hooks usage) * Team Versioning (Merge/Pull Request) * Backend debugging/backup * Basics manipulations: server start/stop, grep logs, find java exceptions and have a look at the source code. * Interface Design * Advanced Mobile UI * Photoshop (Basics and more) * Project Spirit * Scrum/Agile methods * External Testing with clients * JIRA usage for bug-tracking and time-tracking * Can easily be in contact with end clients (kick-off/daily meetings, bills) ------- ### Technical Links {#technicallinks} 1. [AFNetworking 2.0](https://github.com/AFNetworking/AFNetworking) 1. [JSONModel](https://github.com/icanzilb/JSONModel) 1. [Carthage - Swift Package Manager](https://github.com/Carthage/Carthage) 1. [Alamofire - Swift Networking](https://github.com/Alamofire/Alamofire) 1. [Jazzy - Swift Documentation](https://github.com/realm/jazzy) 1. [Appledoc - Obj-C Documentation](https://github.com/tomaz/appledoc) 1. [BlocksKit](https://github.com/zwaldowski/BlocksKit) 1. [Atlassian JIRA](https://www.atlassian.com/software/jira) 1. [Gitlab](https://about.gitlab.com/) ------ ### Experience {#experience} [Worldline, an Atos Company](http://worldline.com/en-us/home/about-us.html)
*iOS Developer* __2013-2015__
* Paylib Solution [(website)](http://www.paylib.fr/) * La Banque Postale wallet application [(Mes Paiements)](https://itunes.apple.com/fr/app/mes-paiements/id699406767?mt=8) * BNP Paribas iOS wallet applications [(1)](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/mon-portefeuille-hello-bank!/id705889374?l=fr&ls=1&mt=8) & [(2)](https://itunes.apple.com/fr/app/mon-portefeuille-bnp-paribas/id676059019?mt=8) * Participate in Société Générale iOS app [(L'appli)](https://itunes.apple.com/fr/app/lappli-societe-generale-pour/id376991016?mt=8) [EG Digital](http://www.egdigital.fr/)
*iOS Intern Developer* __2012-2012__
* Euronews App (iPad UI) [(Euronews)](https://itunes.apple.com/fr/app/euronews/id555667472?mt=8) * Jazz Radio - iOS Streaming app [Jazz Radio](https://itunes.apple.com/fr/app/jazz-radio/id608871294?mt=8) ### Education {#education} [ESIREM](http://esirem.u-bourgogne.fr/)
*InfoTronic Engineer* __2011-2013__
* Mobile development * Electronic development * Embedded Linux * Embedded System * ElectroMagnetism [Polytech Grenoble](http://www.polytech-grenoble.fr/3i.html)
*Informatic Engineer* __2010-2011__
* Embedded Linux * Embedded System [ATS](http://lyc21-eiffel.ac-dijon.fr/fr/formsup/ats/formation/)
*Preparatory Course - Mathematics* __2013-2015__
[Advanced Diploma in Electronics]()
*BAC+BTS (french main diploma + 2 years) in electronics* __2013-2015__
------ ### Footer {#footer} Julien Goudet -- [juliengdt@icloud.com](juliengdt@icloud.com) -- (+33) 0646099017 ------
